src:
KPSN Netral di Kongres Luar Biasa PSSI
01 Nov 2019, 19:12 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pernyataan tegas dikeluarkan Komite Perubahan Sepak Bola Nasional (KPSN) jelang Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang mengagendakan pemilihan pengurus baru periode 2019-2023. KPSN menegaskan bersikap netral dan tidak memihak siapapun.
PSSI akan menggelar KLB di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, pada Sabtu (2/11/2019) besok. Kongres tersebut untuk memilih satu ketua umum (ketum), dua wakil ketua umum (waketum), dan 12 anggota komite eksekutif (exco).
Untuk posisi ketum, ada 11 calon yang akan bersaing yaitu Fary Djemy Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Yesayas Octavianus, Rahim Soekasah, Arief Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benny Erwin, Bernard Limbong, Sarman El Hakim, Mochamad Iriawan, dan La Nyalla Mattalitti. Nama terakhir sebelumya telah memutuskan untuk menarik diri dari kongres lantaran merasa tanggal pelaksanaannya tidak sesuai dengan rekomendasi FIFA.
"KPSN tidak ada urusan dengan soal dukung-mendukung calon tertentu. Siapa pun boleh mengklaim didukung KPSN, itu hak mereka. Tapi faktanya KPSN tidak mendukung siapa-siapa," ujar Ketua KPSN, Suhendra Hadikuntono di Jakarta, Jumat (1/11).

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
KPSN Neutral at PSSI Extraordinary Congress
Nov 01 2019, 19:12 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A firm statement issued by the National Football Change Committee (KPSN) ahead of the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which scheduled the election of the new management for the 2019-2023 period. KPSN asserted being neutral and not taking sides with anyone.
PSSI will hold an KLB at Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, on Saturday (11/02/2019) tomorrow. The Congress elects one general chair (ketum), two deputy chairmen (waketum), and 12 executive committee members (exco).
For the ketum position, there are 11 candidates who will compete, namely Fary Djemy Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Yesayas Octavianus, Rahim Soekasah, Arief Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benny Erwin, Bernard Limbong, Sarman El Hakim, Mochamad Iriawan, and La Nyalla Mattalitti. The last name had decided to withdraw from the congress because it felt the implementation date was not in accordance with FIFA recommendations.
"KPSN has nothing to do with supporting certain candidates. Anyone can claim to be supported by KPSN, that is their right. But in fact KPSN does not support anyone," said KPSN Chairperson Suhendra Hadikuntono in Jakarta, Friday (1/11).

Read the next page, Bolaneters.
